stabilizations.description: Moves  print in a circular pattern around the center.  Best for prints with lower framerates, else the spiraling will be too fast.
stabilizations.name: Animated - Orbit

stabilizations.description: Animate the X carriage with a back-and-forth motion while keeping the Bed stable.  I like this one!
stabilizations.name: Animated - Printing

renderings.name: MP4 - 15 FPS
renderings.description: Renders MP4 at a constant 15FPS. Synchronizes with the default timelapse plugin.

renderings.name: MP4 - Fixed Length - 00:05 + 1 second pre and post roll.
renderings.description: Generates MP4 with a fixed length of 5 seconds. Adds 1 second of pre-roll using the first frame and one second post-roll using the last frame.  Synchronizes with the default timelapse plugin.

renderings.name: MP4 - Fixed Length - 00:15
renderings.description: Generates MP4 with a fixed length of 15 seconds. Synchronizes with the default timelapse plugin.

renderings.name: MP4 - 60 FPS
renderings.description: Renders MP4 at a constant 60FPS. Synchronizes with the default timelapse plugin.

renderings.name: MP4 - Fixed Length - 00:10
renderings.description: Generates MP4 with a fixed length of 10 seconds. Synchronizes with the default timelapse plugin.

renderings.name: MP4 - 30 FPS
renderings.description: Renders MP4 at a constant 30FPS. Synchronizes with the default timelapse plugin.

renderings.name: MP4 - Fixed Length - 01:00
renderings.description: Generates MP4 with a fixed length of 60 seconds. Synchronizes with the default timelapse plugin.

renderings.name: MP4 - Fixed Length - 00:30
renderings.description: Generates MP4 with a fixed length of 5 seconds. Synchronizes with the default timelapse plugin.

camera_exposure_type_options.name: Unknown - Let me know if you know what this option does.
Unknown - Let me know if you know what this option does.

debug_profiles.description: Test your timelapse settings without using any filament.  This feature is experimental, so make sure you unload your filament and monitor your printer during the test.
debug_profiles.name: Test Mode

debug_profiles.description: Logs all optional information during a live print.  This will create a very large log file, so only use this when necessary, or create a new debug profile containing less information.
debug_profiles.name: Full Diagnostic - Live Print

debug_profiles.description: Logs all optional information during a test print.  This will create a very large log file, so only use this when necessary, or create a new debug profile containing less information.
debug_profiles.name: Full Diagnostic - Test Mode

snapshots.name: Height 0.30mm - ZHop & Retract only
snapshots.description: Triggers once every 0.30mm, but only when fully retracted and lifted.

snapshots.name: Layer Change - ZHop & Retract only
snapshots.description: Triggers after each layer change, but only when fully retracted and lifted.

snapshots.name: Gcode - ZHop & Retract only
snapshots.description: Triggers when the snapshot command is detected, but only when fully retracted and lifted.

snapshots.name: Gcode
snapshots.description: Trigger when the snapshot gcode is detected.

snapshots.name: Every 01:00 - ZHop & Retract only
snapshots.description: Triggers once every 60 seconds, but only when fully retracted and lifted.

snapshots.name: Height 0.15mm - ZHop & Retract only
snapshots.description: Triggers once every 0.15mm, but only when fully retracted and lifted.

snapshots.name: Height - 0.15mm
snapshots.description: Suitable for prints with variable layer height, or prints with continuous height adjustment (vase mode).

snapshots.name: Every 00:30 - ZHop & Retract only
snapshots.description: Triggers once every 30 seconds, but only when fully retracted and lifted.

snapshots.name: Every 02:00 - ZHop & Retract only
snapshots.description: Triggers once every 120 seconds, but only when fully retracted and lifted.

snapshots.name: Height 0.20mm -  ZHop & Retract only
snapshots.description: Triggers once every 0.20mm, but only when fully retracted and lifted.

cameras.name: Logitech Webcam
cameras.description: Tested using the Logitech HD Pro Webcam C920 and C310.

cameras.name: Default Webcam
cameras.description: Basically the same settings as the Logitech profile currently.  I will update the defaults if/when more cameras are tested and verified, especially regarding the request templates.
